title: 想做1.13pvp地图，如何设置杀敌数满多少时结束游戏
author: 14dsa5476

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
14dsa5476 发表于 2020-3-6 16:14
请问那个，就是我想组队的那种，比如说红蓝两个队，那个队杀满了人数就成功了之类的，是要把第二条指令改 ...
改成 /scoreboard objectives add teamkill.red teamkill.red

//execute as @a if score @s teamkill.red matches 10.. run say 蓝队杀满10人

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
用execute然后if判断杀敌数（在计分板上吧）
然后执行命令即可啊https://wiki.biligame.com/mc/%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4/execute

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add playerKillCount playerKillCount

高频
/execute as @a if score @s playerKillCount matches 10.. run say 杀满10人

replies.author: 14dsa5476
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-6 15:56
/scoreboard objectives add playerKillCount playerKillCount

高频
请问那个，就是我想组队的那种，比如说红蓝两个队，那个队杀满了人数就成功了之类的，是要把第二条指令改一下吗？

replies.author: 14dsa5476
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-6 15:56
/scoreboard objectives add playerKillCount playerKillCount

高频
感谢！
